name: Shock Taser Prank Simulator
description:
Can you hear the buzzy stun gun sounds approaching? It's time to blow your mind and play some shocking pranks on your friends!

Perfect tool for pranking with electric taser and machine gun sounds. We bring you the best interactive experience with a wide choice of gun simulator.

🚀 Features 🚀
⚡ A wide choice of shock tasers, machine guns and skins.
⚡ Buzzy taser and reverberating gun sounds.
⚡ Stunning 3D graphics gun simulator with high quality effects.
⚡ Synced sound, flash and vibration.
⚡ Awesome skins in style of epic, anime and scifi.
⚡ Accurately simulate tough striking recoils.
⚡ Excellent option for pranking.
⚡ Unique and creative game modes to try both real and fictional weapons.
⚡ Interesting information for each of the selected guns.

Get ready to strike a thunderous electric Stun Gun, spray rounds and rounds of Machine Gun and be overwhelmed with Special Gun designs. Why don't you try Shock Taser Prank Simulator now?

This is a game that contains weapons, gun sounds and electric rays are realistic. However, they are fake guns on the phone, not real guns. There is not the slightest chance you might get hurt or electrocuted. Life could be tough, but not our game.
